welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Malone, a charming city known for its scenic beauty and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and discover all that Malone has to offer, and we hope your stay with us is filled with unforgettable experiences!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cornwall Regional Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Cornwall Regional Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Adirondack Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Richards Field Airport provides services for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Richards Field Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
